verbs.description: [ARG0: small businesses] [V: seeking] [ARG1: seasonal help] need to get creative go beyond the obvious places when looking for staffers owners should recruit seasonal staffers among people who do n't work like retirees or who work off - hours like bartenders says kate zabriskie owner of business training works a company that offers management and other business training owners should also consider flexible staffing offering work in terms of hours rather than days to attract stay - at - home parents and others who have limited time taco bell bjorn erland the navio group managing director kate zabriskie carlos castelan amazon new york vice president indiana the navio
